description:
Redevelopment of the hospital site for mixed tenure residential and residential institutional use to include a general practioners surgery 
a) the retention and conversion of Oakbrook Lodge as 8 flats (4 no.x1bed, 3no.x2bed and 1 no.x4bed), erection of 6 no. x3 bed three storey houses for market sale, erection of 44 no.x2 bed flats in a four storey block, and provision of 58 parking spaces in either integral garages or surface parking
b) the erection of 42 no. x 3 bed three storey houses and 50 no. x1 bed and 52no.x2 bed flats arranged in three, four and five storey blocks to be provided as a mixture of tenure to comprise 98no. affordable (rented) houses and flats and 46 houses and flats for key workers (18 specifically for the employees of Hammersmith Hospitals Trust).
c) the erection of 32 no.unit frail elderley accommodation and wardens accommodation in a three storey block.
d) a new general practioners surgery on the ground floor of the three storey block of flats, and provision of 92 surface parking spaces for the affordable and key worker housing, the frail elderly unit and the general practioners surgery.
e) the provision of three new vehicular accesses onto Goldhawk Road, (the existing accesses to be closed) together with pedestrian accesses, and one new vehicular access onto Ravenscourt Square, the formation of a pedestrian/cycle link onto Ravenscourt Square together with estate roads, landscaping, amenity space and a play area.
